name: issavie
description: ISSAVIE MVP - group trip planning with itinerary, change requests, announcements

scripts.build: node -e "console.error('Root build is disabled. Deploy/create separate Vercel projects with Root Directory set to frontend or backend.'); process.exit(1)"
scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:push: cd backend && npx prisma db push
